cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2011 Nissan Cube with only 65000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2009 Ford Explorer with only 70000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
